alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 15 at 2:28PM CDT until May 15 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 217 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 4 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST KANSAS CHEROKEE CRAWFORD IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSOURI HOWELL OREGON SHANNON IN SOUTHWEST MISSOURI BARRY BARTON JASPER LAWRENCE MCDONALD NEWTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALTON, ANDERSON, AURORA, BAXTER SPRINGS, BIRCH TREE, CARTHAGE, CASSVILLE, CHICOPEE, COLUMBUS, COUCH, GOODMAN, GREER, JOPLIN, KENOMA, LAMAR, LONE OAK, LOWELL, MADRY, MARIONVILLE, MONETT, MONTIER, MOUNT VERNON, NEOSHO, NEUTRAL, NOEL, PINEVILLE, PITTSBURG, POMONA, POTTERSVILLE, RIVERTON, ROCKY COMFORT, SHERWIN, SILOAM SPRINGS, SOUTH FORK, SOUTH WEST CITY, STIPPVILLE, TERESITA, THAYER, THOMASVILLE, WEST PLAINS, WHITE CHURCH, WILDERNESS, AND WINONA.
